original_prompt: A high-end, glossy concept art magazine editorial photograph of an open premium collector's edition Street Fighter Alpha 3 Arcade Ryu Combo Codex page...
theme: 产品摄影 / 游戏周边 / 编辑摄影

subject_variables.main: open premium collector's edition Street Fighter Alpha 3 Arcade Ryu Combo Codex page
subject_variables.complexity: 极高 - 多层次产品细节

technical_parameters.camera: Phase One medium format camera with 100mm macro lens

composition.symmetry: HIGHLY SYMMETRICAL - Ryu as center bridging pages

color_scheme.tone: cool tones with warm metallic accents

original_prompt: 现代Bento网格布局产品展示设计,采用磨砂亚克力透明玻璃材质...
theme: UI/UX设计 / 信息图表 / 产品展示设计

subject_variables.main: 现代Bento网格布局产品展示设计
subject_variables.flexibility: 高度模块化 - 适用于任何产品类型

original_prompt: 【角色设定】你是一位专业的旅行视觉设计师...
theme: 旅行海报设计 / 信息可视化 / 回忆纪念品

visual_style.art_style: 现代极简主义 + 电影级质感
visual_style.design_system: 无边框摄影 + 真实地图集成

composition.symmetry: 非对称 - 艺术性倾斜排列
composition.layout: 标题8% + 地图92% + 照片叠加层 + 信息栏

original_prompt: 场景一至场景五 - 中国传统武侠风格视频场景（5个连续场景）
theme: 视频生成 / 武侠动作片 / 电影级分镜
format: 多场景连续叙事 (5个场景)

subject_variables.main_character: 身着深色中国传统道服长袍的年轻男子，长发束起，背负长剑
subject_variables.antagonist: 巨型凶恶妖狼 - 深色皮毛+蓝色发光纹路+红色眼睛+发光红色尖牙
subject_variables.environment: 中国传统小镇 + 村落小巷 + 竹林

visual_style.art_style: 真实写真 + 电影质感

lighting: 戏剧性光线+强烈红色调

composition.shot_progression: 鸟瞰 → 全身 → 动作 → 对峙 → 特写
composition.narrative_structure: 建立场景 → 介绍角色 → 动作冲突 → 对峙高潮 → 蓄力时刻

color_scheme.color_progression: 柔和暖色 → 自然色 → 昏暗冷色 → 神秘蓝红 → 强烈红色

original_prompt: 基础配置 - 风格定义：写实摄影，超清晰特写，{{人物一致性描述}}的真实生活照片...
theme: 人物肖像摄影 / 参数化提示词系统 / 写实人像生成
format: 模板化提示词框架 (Template-based Prompt System)

subject_variables.consistency_requirement: 高度一致的角色，每次面部和身体都完全相同

脸型: 柔和经典的轮廓脸或瓜子脸

visual_style.approach: 超清晰特写 + 照片级真实感
visual_style.cultural_fusion: 中式优雅自然妆容 + 古典温柔气质

camera.default: 佳能 EOS R5 全画幅相机

lighting.type: 柔和温暖的黄金时刻自然阳光
lighting.effect: 在湿润的皮肤和妆容上形成闪烁的高光

facial_details.eyes: 高度细节化，大而富有表现力，浓密修长的自然睫毛，深邃清晰的虹膜，柔和内省意的高光和水润的闪影
facial_details.nose: 笔直而柔和的鼻梁，完美的古典比例，微妙的高光，小巧精致的鼻尖
facial_details.lips: 饱满自然的樱桃唇，带有柔和的光泽色调，优雅的丘比特弓形结构
facial_details.skin: 无瑕，明亮如玉的瓷肌，带有自然的细微腮红，散发出光泽透润的光泽

detail_enhancers.texture: 湿皮肤，大量逼真的水滴，真正湿皮肤纹理，水珠与妆容的互动

mood_atmosphere.emotional_tone: 柔和迷人，结合古典温柔与微妙的诱惑魅力

expression.default: 明亮温柔的微笑，露出完美洁白整齐的牙齿

gaze.default: 柔和迷人的目光，能唤起亲密的渴望

constraints.consistency: 高度一致的角色，每次面部和身体都完全相同
constraints.visibility: 只有裸露的肩膀和锁骨露出水面，水面以上不可见任何衣物或肩带
constraints.quality: 妆容没有瑕疵，无瑕温暖魅力

body_visibility.default: 只有裸露的肩膀和锁骨露出水面

color_scheme.skin_tone: 明亮如玉的瓷肌，带有自然的细微腮红
color_scheme.lighting_color: 柔和温暖的黄金时刻自然阳光

references.technical_reference: 佳能 EOS R5 全画幅相机
references.cultural_style: 中国古典美学 + 现代时尚摄影

ai_generation_challenges: 人物跨图一致性（需要 ControlNet / LoRA）
精确水位控制
湿皮肤纹理与水珠物理效果
妆容与水的互动细节

original_prompt: A premium vertical split concept poster for [品牌名称] [产品名称], showing ONE [产品] split in half...
theme: 产品对分海报设计 / 通用广告模板
format: 通用参数化广告模板 (Universal Parametric Ad Template)
universal_applicability: 跨品类（科技/美食/时尚/机械）

subject_variables.template_type: 产品对分海报（Split Product Poster）
subject_variables.core_concept: 单一产品垂直对分 - 左侧写实摄影 + 右侧解构艺术

visual_style.transition: Seamless transition within ONE unified product

constraints.critical: ONE single product, Perfect vertical cut

original_prompt: A high-end, glossy concept art magazine editorial photograph of a unique premium collector's edition [手册] for [游戏]...
theme: 游戏指南手册设计 / 通用收藏品模板
format: 通用参数化收藏品模板 (Universal Parametric Collectible Template)

subject_variables.core_concept: 将游戏攻略书重新设计为奢华雕塑般的收藏品
subject_variables.reimagination: Sacred relic / Forbidden grimoire / Imperial war manual

visual_style.design_philosophy: 游戏氛围 + Refined minimalist elegance

technical_parameters.camera: Phase One medium format with 100mm macro lens
technical_parameters.focus: Extremely shallow depth of field, razor-sharp on hero details
technical_parameters.lighting: Sophisticated studio softbox with rim lighting

constraints.layout: Bottom-left: product description, Bottom-right: brand logo

ai_generation_challenges: 极致材质真实性（多层材质同时渲染）
打开状态的物理准确性
微距细节的清晰度
中文文字生成

original_prompt: Ultra-realistic 8K scene viewed from a THREE-QUARTER BACK ANGLE: A photorealistic young woman diving forward into manga book...
theme: 跨次元救援场景 / 真人进入漫画世界
format: 次元穿越视觉效果模板 (Dimensional Crossover Visual Template)
core_concept: 真实世界 → 漫画世界的单向穿越过程
unique_features: 70-80%身体已转换为漫画（黑白线条）
三分之二后视角（看到进入过程）
完整叙事（救援漫画中的猫）
单向运动强调（REAL → MANGA，NOT reverse）

original_prompt: 创建一个3x3网格布局海报，包含9个不同的部分，并在上方叠加一个站立的3D女性图像...
format: 多层次拼贴模板 (Multi-layer Collage Template)

layout_structure.row_1: 3个独立完整场景（湖边/海边/森林）
layout_structure.row_2_3: 3组完整照片的水平切割（在服装边界处）

critical_requirements: 所有场景的女性必须是同一个人
第2-3行的切割必须在服装边界（裤腰带位置）
上下两格必须像被刀切开的照片一样完美对齐
3D人物有接地阴影、光晕、景深效果
unique_features: 水平切割完美对齐机制
人物一致性约束（同一位女性）

original_prompt: 提示词中的女人外表是惊艳的中国美女，优雅的古典与现代魅力结合...
theme: 中国美女人物描写 / 极致面部细节模板
format: 精细化人物特征描述模板 (Ultra-detailed Character Description Template)
core_concept: 极致的面部细节描述 + 古典与现代融合美学
unique_features: 9层面部细节框架（迄今最详细）
湿皮肤效果升级版（油光+水滴+晕染）
古典与现代融合的具体化
复合情绪表达（温柔+诱惑+渴望）
relationship: 深度优先 vs 广度优先

original_prompt: masterpiece, best quality, ultra detailed, 8k... saber artoria pendragon from fate/stay night as a realistic human woman...
theme: 动漫角色真人化 / 混合风格人像 / 玻璃碎片爆炸特效
format: 真人-动漫混合模板 (Realistic-Anime Hybrid Template)
core_concept: 动漫角色真实化 + 玻璃碎片动态爆炸 + 双重风格融合

subject_variables.main: Saber Artoria Pendragon from Fate/stay night
subject_variables.character_adaptation: realistic human woman with anime features retention
key_elements: iconic blonde hair + green eyes + ahoge
subject_variables.dual_rendering: realistic human base + anime feature preservation

visual_style.face_rendering: realistic human woman with subtle anime proportions
visual_style.clothing_rendering: anime-accurate blue dress + realistic fabric physics
visual_style.special_effect: 玻璃碎片爆炸 (Glass Shard Explosion)

technical_parameters.dynamic_elements: flying glass shards, motion blur, particle effects
technical_parameters.depth_of_field: shallow DOF with sharp focus on face

detail_enhancers: photorealistic skin texture + anime eye style
realistic fabric wrinkles + anime color saturation

mood_atmosphere.atmosphere: dynamic action moment frozen in time

constraints.character_accuracy: must retain Saber's iconic features (blonde, green eyes, ahoge, blue dress)
constraints.realism_balance: realistic human proportions but keep anime aesthetic appeal
constraints.effect_integration: glass shards naturally integrated into composition

rendering.required: realistic human base, photorealistic skin texture, 8K ultra detailed
rendering.forbidden: 过度真实(overly realistic), 过度卡通(overly cartoon), deformed anatomy

style_balance.required: anime feature preservation (eyes, proportions, color saturation), realistic fabric physics
style_balance.forbidden: pure anime 2D style, pure photorealism without anime elements

effects.required: glass shards naturally integrated, realistic physics
effects.forbidden: poorly integrated effects, floating without physics

composition.angle: dynamic angle (slight tilt or low angle for heroic feel)
composition.background: abstract or blurred with glass shards

color_scheme.saturation: anime-level color saturation + realistic lighting modulation

visual_references: glass explosion VFX from action films

ai_generation_challenges: 真人-动漫混合比例平衡（避免过度真实或过度卡通）
保留角色辨识度同时真人化
玻璃碎片动态效果的物理真实性
服装的动漫风格与真实材质融合
面部表情的anime风格在realistic脸上的表现
unique_features: 真人-动漫混合渲染系统
动漫色彩+真实光照混合
可适配任何动漫角色真人化
complementary_with: Prompt #8 (次元穿越) - 都涉及2D/3D风格转换
relationship: 风格融合 vs 维度穿越

original_prompt: 一个拟人化的{物品名称}站立着，{物品特征描述}...
theme: 拟人化物品 / 中国复古霓虹灯牌 / 对话框叙事
format: 拟人化物品模板 (Anthropomorphic Object Template)
core_concept: 无生命物品拟人化 + 中国复古街景 + 漫画对话框叙事

subject_variables.main_subject: {物品名称} - 可替换任何物品
subject_variables.anthropomorphism: 添加卡通手臂、腿、表情五官
subject_variables.character_pose: 站立姿态，双手叉腰/挥手/指向
subject_variables.expression: 友好微笑/自豪表情/惊讶神态

visual_style.background_style: 中国复古街景 + 霓虹灯美学
visual_style.lighting: 霓虹灯照明 + 夜景氛围
visual_style.overall_aesthetic: 现代3D卡通 + 80-90年代中国怀旧

technical_parameters.lighting_setup: 霓虹灯主光源 + 环境光
technical_parameters.texture_quality: 卡通材质 + 霓虹灯发光材质

constraints.anthropomorphism_balance: 保留物品原始特征的同时添加拟人元素
constraints.cultural_accuracy: 中国复古招牌的字体、颜色、样式要准确
constraints.speech_bubble: 清晰的对话框，包含中文文字
constraints.background_focus: 背景不能喧宾夺主，物品角色是主体

color_scheme.character_colors: 基于物品原始颜色 + 卡通饱和度提升
color_scheme.background_tone: 深色夜景（深蓝/深灰）+ 霓虹点缀
color_scheme.overall_palette: 暖色调霓虹 + 冷色调夜空对比

cultural_references: 复古理发店/餐馆霓虹灯

ai_generation_challenges: 中文霓虹灯招牌文字生成（需后期Photoshop添加）
对话框内中文文字清晰度
拟人化比例平衡（保留物品特征）
复古霓虹灯材质真实感
背景街景细节与主体的层次分离
unique_features: 中国文化元素深度集成

original_prompt: Ultra-realistic cinematic 3D high-octane racing scene, highly universal template inspired by Initial D style...
theme: 赛车动作场景 / 多面板布局 / Initial D风格模板
format: 通用赛车场景模板 (Universal Racing Scene Template)
core_concept: 超写实主面板 + 三个锁定副面板 + Initial D精神 + 角色/车辆自适配

character_adaptation.anime_origin: hyper-realistic live-action anime character (real skin, sweat, G-force)

subject_variables.vehicle_options: 任何经典赛车型号（自动匹配角色或用户指定）
subject_variables.scene_type: midnight wet neon mountain downhill hairpin drift

visual_style.main_panel_style: FORCED hyper-realistic movie aesthetic (NO manga elements)

character_rendering.anime_to_real: live-action cosplay quality with anime features retention
character_rendering.details: real skin texture, sweat, G-force facial deformation

visual_style.manga_elements: limited refined onomatopoeia (only 4 key words, subtly blended)

technical_parameters.physics_simulation: ultra-photoreal (water spray, tire smoke, motion blur)
technical_parameters.lighting: neon reflections + wet surface reflections + headlight trails
technical_parameters.camera_work: dynamic action shot capturing extreme drift angle

mood_atmosphere.tension: extreme danger - grazing guardrail by millimeters
mood_atmosphere.energy: engine roar + tire screech + heartbeat-rev sync
mood_atmosphere.cultural_vibe: purest Initial D soul + Hollywood racing physics

constraints.main_panel_realism: FORCED hyper-realistic, NO manga elements in main panel
constraints.onomatopoeia_limit: only 4 key manga words, subtly blended
constraints.panel_layout: strict 70% top + 3 equal secondary panels below in locked row
constraints.character_accuracy: retain signature features while making realistic
constraints.vehicle_accuracy: faithful to original model (interior gauges, shifter, console)

composition.secondary_panels: 30% space - 3 equal panels in strict left-center-right row

panel_breakdown.top_main: full drift scene with character in car
panel_breakdown.bottom_left: character portrait close-up + small orbiting text

references.visual_quality: Hollywood racing movie physics (Fast & Furious quality)
references.racing_technique: Initial D gutter run + inertia drift techniques
references.onomatopoeia_style: Japanese manga sound effects (キィィ/シュー/ドドド/ガガガ)

ai_generation_challenges: 多面板精确布局控制（70/30比例+三等分）
动漫角色的真人化渲染（保留特征+真实皮肤）
极限漂移物理效果（40度倾斜+轮胎烟雾+水花）
面板边框的精确定位
日文拟声词的自然融入（不破坏写实感）
车辆内饰的型号准确性（不同车型仪表盘）
G-force面部变形的真实表现
霓虹灯反射的多层次物理计算
unique_features: 角色来源智能适配系统（动漫→真人化 / 真人→写实）
车型自动匹配机制（角色→经典座驾）
Initial D技法库（gutter run / inertia drift）
限定拟声词系统（仅4个关键词）
双重风格融合（超写实主体+漫画元素点缀）
可适配任何赛车IP（Initial D/湾岸/头文字D/极品飞车）
Hollywood物理+日本漫画精神混合
complementary_with: Prompt #11 (真人-动漫混合) - 都涉及角色风格转换

original_prompt: Professional hyperrealistic cinematic close-up photograph... where the [物质类型] naturally coalesces into [角色描述]...
theme: 物质塑形人物 / 超现实摄影 / 产品艺术摄影
format: 物质塑形模板 (Material Sculpting Template)
core_concept: 真实物品 + 物质流动塑形成角色形态 + 超现实艺术摄影

subject_variables.main_object: [物品名称] - 可替换任何产品
subject_variables.formed_character: [完整角色描述 + 外貌特征]
subject_variables.character_options: 任何角色（动漫/神话/历史/原创）

visual_style.material_rendering: organic, conscious, artistic - twists and sculpts itself
visual_style.character_formation: material perfectly defines facial features, expression, details
visual_style.lighting_style: dramatic chiaroscuro + volumetric god rays + soft lens flares

technical_parameters.camera: Canon EOS R5 with 85mm f/1.4 lens
technical_parameters.effects: soft lens flares, iridescent glimmers, internal glow

detail_enhancers: ultra-high micro-detail on both object and formed figure

mood_atmosphere.emotional_depth: captured in a single frozen moment
mood_atmosphere.material_consciousness: as if the material possesses consciousness and life force

constraints.material_detail: every facial feature, hair, clothing texture precisely defined
constraints.background_simplicity: moody atmospheric darkness with faint bokeh
constraints.lighting_accuracy: realistic light interaction where material meets air

composition.secondary_element: formed character from material (ethereal but detailed)
composition.background: moody atmospheric darkness with faint bokeh particles
composition.depth_layers: sharp object → material formation → bokeh background

color_scheme.primary_tones: determined by product and material type

references.similar_concepts: smoke photography art, liquid sculpture photography

ai_generation_challenges: 物质流动的自然有机形态
物质塑形的精确细节（面部/衣物/头发）
物质与空气/光线的真实交互
保持产品清晰同时让塑形也细致
烟雾/液体的物理准确性
内部发光效果的自然感
景深控制（产品锐利+背景虚化+塑形细致）
unique_features: 物质意识化概念（material possesses consciousness）
超现实+超写实双重标准
Canon EOS R5专业摄影规格
可适配任何产品+任何角色组合
高端产品艺术摄影应用
application_scenarios: 香水广告（香水雾塑形女神）
咖啡广告（咖啡烟塑形人物）
化妆品广告（粉末塑形美女）
complementary_with: Prompt #1, #7 (高端产品摄影) - 都是Phase One/Canon专业摄影级

original_prompt: Abstract illustration, Neo-Chinese style, traditional Chinese ink wash painting shuimo style... A single long vertical hanging scroll divided into four seamless seasonal sections...
theme: 中国四季卷轴画 / 水墨画风格 / 新中式插画
format: 四季竖轴卷轴模板 (Four Seasons Vertical Scroll Template)
core_concept: 单幅长竖轴卷轴 + 四季无缝过渡 + 传统水墨画 + 诗词印章

subject_variables.sections: 4 seamless seasonal sections (spring → summer → autumn → winter)

seasonal_elements.spring: pink cherry blossoms + light green willow + young lady + white deer
seasonal_elements.summer: pale cyan lotus leaves + monk + black donkey
seasonal_elements.autumn: orange-red maple leaves + scholar + white horse
seasonal_elements.winter: gray-white plum blossoms + pine + traveler + white horse

visual_style.painting_technique: traditional Chinese ink wash painting shuimo style
visual_style.color_approach: subtle ink gradients with minimal elegant colors
visual_style.figure_rendering: simply outlined with minimal delicate ink lines
visual_style.foliage_rendering: clear rhythmic textures and veins, edges blur and fade

technical_parameters.transition_technique: soft natural transitions with subtle ink gradients and misty blending

constraints.figure_detail: minimal delicate ink lines, no unnecessary details
constraints.color_restraint: elegant pale colors, not heavy saturated
constraints.transition_quality: seamless between seasons, no visible seams
constraints.seal_restraint: small vermilion red seal, not cluttered
constraints.avoid: photorealistic, 3D render, overly detailed faces, crowded, harsh outlines

composition.layout: single vertical scroll divided into 4 equal horizontal sections
composition.section_order: top to bottom: spring → summer → autumn → winter
composition.balance: foliage dominant, figures and animals secondary

color_scheme.spring: fresh elegant pale pink + light green
color_scheme.summer: fresh elegant pale cyan + light green
color_scheme.autumn: elegant warm pale orange + soft gold
color_scheme.winter: cool elegant pale silver-gray + soft crimson
color_scheme.overall_palette: subtle ink gradients + minimal elegant seasonal colors

art_style: traditional Chinese shuimo (水墨) ink wash painting
cultural_elements: ancient Chinese poetry (4-7 characters or couplets)

ai_generation_challenges: 四季无缝过渡（无明显分割线）
水墨渐变的自然感
中文诗词书法生成（需后期手动添加）
朱文印章的真实感
留白比例控制（不能太满）
人物极简化但有神韵
植物边缘的自然虚化效果
unique_features: 极简人物+丰富植物对比
可替换季节元素快速定制
complementary_with: Prompt #10 (中国美女) - 都强调中国文化美学

original_prompt: 编号为 12｜Detail｜INTEGRATED HEADSET 头碗组特写（16:9）... Trek Madone SLR Gen 8 系列产品摄影（16张完整系列）
theme: 高端自行车产品摄影系列 / 系统化产品展示 / 双语商业海报
format: 系列化产品摄影模板 (Systematic Product Photography Template)
core_concept: 1个Hero主图 + 多角度细节特写 + 统一视觉系统 + 双语标注

subject_variables.main_product: Trek Madone SLR Gen 8 (蝴蝶公路车)

color_options.02_project_one: metallic deep red to black gradient

background_system.details: seamless deep black / dark grey gradient
background_system.mood: smooth black to deep blue gradient

visual_style.lighting_style: soft studio rim light + crisp shadows
visual_style.brand_aesthetic: 极简高端 + 双语标注 + 强调科技

lighting_setup.hero: soft studio rim light on carbon weave
lighting_setup.macro: soft diffused macro with subtle rim light
lighting_setup.mood: soft diffused rim light + faint shadows

technical_parameters.negative_constraints: cables, hands, reflections, watermark, grease, dirt, dust, tools, clutter

mood_atmosphere.emotional_appeal: 速度、轻量、空气动力、精密工程
mood_atmosphere.target_audience: 高端公路车玩家、竞赛选手、定制需求客户
key_messages: Cut through wind. Ride in calm.

constraints.visual_consistency: 整个系列统一风格（背景、字体、排版、光照）
constraints.cable_visibility: 严格隐藏所有线缆 (strict clean layout, no visible cables)

branding_placement.top_right: Engineered speed. / Aero calm, pure power.

typography_system.backdrop: huge bold condensed product name (subtle, do NOT cover bike)
typography_system.cta: pill button with arrow (RIDE NOW → / EXPLORE NOW →)

layout_system.details: 1/3 frame subject (bottom-right) + 2/3 negative space (left) with two-column text

composition.hero_layout: center bike + right side text block + backdrop typography
composition.detail_layout: subject bottom-right (~1/3 frame) + large left negative space with two-column typography

aspect_ratio_strategy.16:9: 主要展示格式（hero + 大部分细节）
aspect_ratio_strategy.5:4: 特殊部件特写（把组、座垫等）

product_colors.custom_02: metallic deep red to black gradient

accent_colors.red: electric red (MADONE backdrop in action shot)

color_scheme.typography_colors: white / light grey on dark backgrounds

ai_generation_challenges: 16张图片的视觉一致性（统一光照、背景、排版）
隐藏所有线缆的技术难度（fully integrated routing）
碳纤维编织纹理的真实感
中文+英文双语排版的精确控制
微距特写的景深与细节平衡
多个Project One配色的色彩准确性
悬浮/动态效果的自然感（阴影、反射、运动模糊）
两栏排版系统的对齐与间距
Logo、CTA、价格等元素的精确定位
unique_features: 统一视觉语言（背景+光照+排版）
Hero + Detail + Action + Mood 四类拍摄模式
高端自行车产品摄影标准模板

series_breakdown.01_hero: Madone SLR旗舰款全车俯视图（16:9）
series_breakdown.07_drivetrain: 碳纤曲柄+链条传动系统（16:9）
series_breakdown.14_floating: 悬浮整车蓝宝石蓝配色（16:9）
series_breakdown.15_variant: 哑光枪灰+紫色炫彩配色（16:9）

complementary_with: Prompt #1 (Phase One产品摄影), #7 (游戏收藏品摄影)
relationship: 都是高端产品摄影，但#16是完整16张系列化系统

original_prompt: hyperrealistic analog photograph of a stunningly beautiful East Asian woman... Jinx from League of Legends in provocative selfie pose...
theme: 角色Cosplay真人摄影 / 胶片模拟美学 / 挑逗性姿势
format: 真人Cosplay摄影模板 (Live-action Cosplay Photography Template)
core_concept: 超写实胶片摄影 + 游戏角色还原 + 挑逗性自拍姿势 + Hasselblad中画幅美学

subject_variables.ethnicity_adaptation: East Asian woman with refined celebrity-like features
subject_variables.facial_features: delicate symmetrical, flawless porcelain skin, perfect body proportions

signature_features.hair: vibrant electric blue, two massive floor-length braids, copper bands, loose messy bangs
signature_features.eyes: manic luminous ruby-pink eyes, heavy seductive half-lidded gaze
signature_features.tattoos: distinctive blue cloud tattoos (right arm + ribs)

costume_details.top: scant cropped leather halter with cross-straps, exposed toned midriff
costume_details.bottom: low-rise vertical-striped shorts, hanging leather belts, ammo pouches
accessories: asymmetrical arm wear (black fingerless glove + leather wrist guard)
mismatched legwear (purple striped thigh-high + knee guard)
oversized combat boots with metal plating

subject_variables.pose: provocative low squat, phone raised high, chest forward, knees wide, hips tilted, fingers on inner thigh/choker
subject_variables.energy: doing it for the algorithm - flirtatious and inviting

visual_style.texture: fine organic film grain, nostalgic aesthetic
visual_style.tonal_quality: incredible tonal depth and dynamic range
visual_style.anti_style: no digital sharpness, no plastic look, no 3D CGI, no cartoon/anime

constraints.realism_standard: hyperrealistic analog film, no digital/CGI look
constraints.character_accuracy: Jinx signature features (blue hair, pink eyes, tattoos, outfit)
constraints.film_authenticity: organic grain, no digital sharpening, nostalgic aesthetic
constraints.exposure: no fully nude, no explicit exposure

photography.required: hyperrealistic analog film, Hasselblad medium format, Kodak Portra 400, organic grain
photography.forbidden: digital photo, 3D render, CGI, artificial sharpening, excessive noise reduction

rendering.required: flawless porcelain skin with realistic texture, warm rich skin tones

character_features.required: East Asian woman with Jinx features (blue hair, pink eyes, tattoos)
character_features.forbidden: non-Asian features, bright cheerful innocent expression

composition.shot_type: medium full body shot (low squat pose)
composition.angle: eye-level or slightly low angle (emphasizing pose)
composition.pose_dynamics: low squat, phone selfie gesture, provocative angles

color_scheme.skin_tone: warm rich tones with golden-hour glow
color_scheme.overall_palette: warm analog film tones + vibrant character colors

references.film_references: Kodak Portra 400 warm tones + organic grain

ai_generation_challenges: 胶片质感模拟（organic grain vs digital noise）
East Asian面部特征准确性
挑逗姿势的自然感（避免色情感）
Hasselblad中画幅浅景深效果
角色特征准确还原（蓝发、粉眼、纹身）
皮肤质感（真实毛孔vs过度光滑）
服装细节的leather质感
golden-hour光照的warm tones
避免3D/CGI感（保持analog真实感）
unique_features: 真人vs角色平衡（realistic but character-accurate）
可适配任何游戏/动漫角色Cosplay
application_scenarios: 游戏角色真人化商业推广
complementary_with: Prompt #11 (Saber真人化) - 都是游戏/动漫角色真人化
relationship: 都涉及角色真人化，但#17强调胶片美学+挑逗性

original_prompt: Professional hyperrealistic cinematic photograph... real East Asian cosplayer as Princess Peach in practical Piranha Plant field...
theme: 真人电影级Cosplay摄影 / 实景道具搭建 / 奇幻场景
format: 电影实拍场景模板 (Live-action Film Set Template)
core_concept: 真人演员 + 实体道具 + 实景搭建 + 电影级摄影 + 奇幻氛围

subject_variables.character: Princess Peach from Super Mario Bros.
subject_variables.actor_type: real young East Asian female cosplayer

facial_details.lips: soft full with gentle pink gloss
facial_details.skin: flawless yet realistically textured (subtle pores, natural imperfections)
facial_details.hair: long golden blonde wig (visible strands, flyaways, realistic volume)

costume.gown: meticulously crafted flowing pink silk-like fabric with real ripples

subject_variables.environment: sprawling real field of enormous practical Piranha Plant props

visual_style.production_approach: high-budget live-action fantasy film set with real practical props
visual_style.set_design: massive environmental build, full-scale practical props
visual_style.aesthetic: dreamy whimsical atmosphere frozen in movie still
visual_style.realism_standard: photorealistic human authenticity (skin pores, hair strands, breathing, micro-expressions)

technical_parameters.focus: razor-sharp on face, gown texture, nearest Piranha Plant
technical_parameters.color_grading: rich tonal cinematic emphasizing warmth and vibrancy
technical_parameters.depth_of_field: creamy bokeh background field to horizon
technical_parameters.effects: subtle natural lens flares, filmic grain

detail_enhancers: backlighting rim light on hair and gown edges
skin pores, hair strands, fabric weave visible

mood_atmosphere.atmosphere: dreamy, breathtaking sense of scale and wonder
mood_atmosphere.scene_mood: fantastical yet grounded in practical reality

constraints.realism_standard: real human actor, not CGI/3D render
constraints.hair_realism: visible individual strands, flyaways, natural movement

production.required: real full-scale practical props, massive environmental build, live-action film set

rendering.required: photorealistic human authenticity, realistic skin texture with pores, visible hair strands
rendering.forbidden: wax figure, plastic skin, doll-like, uncanny valley, AI artifacts, digital smoothing, porcelain flawless

character_features.required: East Asian facial features, natural imperfections
character_features.forbidden: non-Asian features, cartoon/anime influence, deformed anatomy

composition.leading_lines: plant stems guiding eye to princess
composition.depth_strategy: balanced foreground/background drawing viewer into scene
composition.focal_layers: sharp subject → mid-ground props → creamy bokeh horizon

color_scheme.overall_palette: rich warm cinematic tones, vibrant yet natural

time_season.lighting_condition: soft directional ambient light with warm highlights

visual_quality: high-budget fantasy films (Lord of the Rings practical sets)

ai_generation_challenges: 真人vs CGI边界控制（避免uncanny valley）
East Asian面部特征 + Princess Peach特征融合
实体道具的真实材质感（fabric petals, foam jaws）
自然光照的电影级质感
皮肤真实纹理（毛孔、微小瑕疵）
假发的真实发丝效果（individual strands, flyaways）
服装面料的自然褶皱和运动
实景深度和bokeh的自然过渡
呼吸动作和微表情的捕捉
避免塑料/蜡像质感
unique_features: 可适配任何游戏/童话角色真人化电影
relationship: 都是游戏角色真人化，但#18强调电影级实景道具
